snippet: Mitt Romney, in front of the small crowd in a hotel conference room, was unexpectedly expansive and reflective, as if trying to make sense of a defeat that seemed to genuinely startle him.
abstract: Mitt Romney, in front of the small crowd in a hotel conference room, was unexpectedly expansive and reflective, as if trying to make sense of a defeat that seemed to genuinely startle him.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and ASHLEY PARKER

headline.main: At a Breakfast With Aides, Romney Reflects on the Campaign
